                                  P r e s e n t s               
                                                                        

Stigmata from Sri Lanka, is one of the best emerging Metal Bands in Asia. They are a Thrash/Melo-Death Metal band & the themes of their latest full-length album, Silent Chaos Serpentine, are generally from poetry by the bandÃƒÂ¢??s vocalist Suresh, and cover topics such as apathy, child abuse, politics, and inner struggle.

This album got Excellent reviews in Basementbar & Metal Forge.
